item.title: First Class
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

[code=java]package org.hyperion.rs2.model.content;

import org.hyperion.rs2.event.ActionEvent;
import org.hyperion.rs2.event.Event;
import org.hyperion.rs2.handlers.LogicHandler;
import org.hyperion.rs2.handlers.interfaces.ButtonHandler;
import org.hyperion.rs2.handlers.interfaces.InitiationHandler;
import org.hyperion.rs2.handlers.interfaces.ItemOnItemHandler;
import org.hyperion.rs2.model.Animation;
import org.hyperion.rs2.model.Item;
import org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition;
import org.hyperion.rs2.model.Player;
import org.hyperion.rs2.model.Skills;
import org.hyperion.rs2.model.World;
import org.hyperion.rs2.model.container.Inventory;
import org.hyperion.rs2.util.IoBufferUtils;

public class Fletching extends LogicHandler implements InitiationHandler, ItemOnItemHandler, ButtonHandler {

/**
 * Order: Normal, Oak, WIllow, Maple, Yew, Magic 
 */
public static final int[] LOGS = {1511, 1521, 1519, 1517, 1515, 1513};

/**
 * First number = Shortbow(U)
 * Second number = Longbow(U)
 * Third number = Arrow shafts
 * Order: Normal, Oak, Willow, Maple, Yew, Magic
 */
public static final int[][] UNSTRUNG_BOWS = {{52, 50, 48}, {54, 56}, {60, 58}, {64, 62},
	{68, 66}, {72, 70}};

/**
 * First number = Shortbow(U)
 * Second number = Longbow(U)
 * Third number = Arrow shafts
 * Order: Normal, Oak, Willow, Maple, Yew, Magic
 */
public static final double[][] RECIEVED_UNSTRUNG_EXPERIENCE = {{5, 5, 10}, {16.5, 25},
	{33.3, 41.5}, {50, 58.3}, {66.5, 75}, {83.3, 91.5}};

/**
 * First number = Shortbow(U)
 * Second number = Longbow(U)
 * Third number = Arrow shafts
 * Order: Normal, Oak, Willow, Maple, Yew, Magic
 */
public static final int[][] REQUIRED_LEVELS = {{1, 5, 10}, {20, 25}, {35, 40},
	{50, 55}, {65, 70}, {80, 85}};

/**
 * Order: Longbow, Shortbow, Oak Shortbow, Oak Longbow, Willow Longbow, Willow Shortbow,
 * Maple Longbow, Maple Shortbow, Yew Longbow, Yew Shortbow, Magic Longbow, Magic Shortbow
 */
private static final int[][][] STRUNG_BOWS = {{{-1, -1}, {841, 5}, {839, 10}}, {{843, 20}, {845, 25}}, 
	{{849, 35}, {847, 40}}, {{853, 50}, {851, 55}}, {{857, 65}, {855, 70}}, {{861, 80}, {859, 85}}};

private static final double[] RECIEVED_STRUNG_EXPERIENCE = {5, 10, 16.5, 25, 45, 33.3, 41.5, 50, 58.3, 
67.5, 75, 83.25, 91.5};

private static final int[][] ARROWHEADS = {{39, 1}, {40, 15}, {41, 30}, {42, 45}, {43, 60}, {44, 75}};//, {2861, 5}}; wolf bones, for ogre arrows, not for normal arrowshafts.

private static final double[] ARROWHEAD_EXP = {2.6, 3.8, 6.3, 8.8, 11.3, 13.8, 3.8};

private static final int[][] DART_TIPS = {{819, 1}, {820, 22}, {821, 37}, {822, 52}, {823, 67}, {824, 81}};

private static final double[] DARTS_EXP = {1.8, 3.8, 7.5, 11.2, 15, 18.8};

private static final int[] FINISHED_DARTS = {806, 807, 808, 809, 810, 811};

public static final int[] FINISHED_ARROWS = {882, 884, 886, 888, 890, 892};

public static final String[][] FLETCHING_NAMES  = {{ "Arrow Shafts", "Short Bow", "Long Bow"},
{"Oak Short Bow", "Oak Long Bow"}, {"Willow Short Bow", "Willow Long Bow"},
{"Maple Short Bow", "Maple Long Bow"}, {"Yew Short Bow", "Yew Long Bow"}, 
{"Magic Short Bow", "Magic Long Bow"}};

public static final int[] CHILDREN = {8883, 8884, 8885};
public static final int[] CHILDREN2 = {8870, 8869};

@Override
public void init() throws Exception {
	System.out.println("Fletching Initialized");		
}


@Override
public boolean handleButton(Player player, int interfaceId, int buttonId, int buttonId2) {
	if (interfaceId == 8866) {
		switch(buttonId) {
			case 8874://make1
				make(player, 1, 0);
				break;
			case 8878://make1
				make(player, 1, 1);
				break;
			case 8873://make5
				make(player, 5, 0);
				break;
			case 8877://make5
				make(player, 5, 1);
				break;
			case 8872://make10
				make(player, 10, 0);
				break;
			case 8876://make10
				make(player, 10, 1);
				break;
		}
	} else if (interfaceId == 8880) {
		switch(buttonId) {
			case 8889://make1
				make(player, 1, 0);
				break;
			case 8893://make1
				make(player, 1, 1);
				break;
			case 8897://make1
				make(player, 1, 2);
				break;
			case 8888://make5
				make(player, 5, 0);
				break;
			case 8892://make5
				make(player, 5, 1);
				break;
			case 8896://make5
				make(player, 5, 2);
				break;
			case 8887://make10
				make(player, 10, 0);
				break;
			case 8891://make10
				make(player, 10, 1);
				break;
			case 8895://make10
				make(player, 10, 2);
				break;
		}
	}
	return false;
}

@Override
public boolean handleItemOnItem(final Player player, int interfaceId, int usedId,	int usedSlot, int withId, int withSlot) {
	int arrayIndex = -1;
	if (usedId == 946 || withId == 946) {
		for (int i = 0; i < LOGS.length; i++) {
			if (usedId == LOGS[i] || withId == LOGS[i]) {
				arrayIndex = i;
				break;
			}
		}
		final int arrayIndex2 = arrayIndex;
		ActionEvent event = new ActionEvent() {
			private Event event;

			@Override
			public void run() {
				event = new Event(0) {

					@Override
					public void execute() {
						if(UNSTRUNG_BOWS[arrayIndex2].length > 2) {
							for (int i = 0; i < UNSTRUNG_BOWS[arrayIndex2].length; i++) {
							player.getActionSender().sendInterfaceModel(8883+i, 175, UNSTRUNG_BOWS[arrayIndex2][i]);
							//player.getActionSender().sendMoveChild(0, -15, 8883 + i);
							//player.getActionSender().sendMoveChild(0, 60, 8889 + i * 4);
							player.getActionSender().sendString(8889 + i * 4 ,"" + FLETCHING_NAMES[arrayIndex2][i]);
							}
							player.getActionSender().sendChatboxInterface(8880);
						} else {
							for (int i = 0; i < UNSTRUNG_BOWS[arrayIndex2].length; i++) {
							player.getActionSender().sendInterfaceModel(8869 + i, 175, UNSTRUNG_BOWS[arrayIndex2][i]);
							//player.getActionSender().sendMoveChild(player, 303, 2 + i, 0, -15);
							player.getActionSender().sendString(8874 + i * 4, "" + FLETCHING_NAMES[arrayIndex2][i]);
							}
							player.getActionSender().sendChatboxInterface(8866);
						}
						
						player.addTemporary("FLETCHING_INDEX", arrayIndex2);
						stop();							
					}						
				};
				World.getWorld().submit(event);
			}

			@Override
			public void stop() {
				player.getActionSender().sendCloseInterface();					
			}
		};
		player.addTemporary("ACTION_EVENT", event);
		event.run();
	} else if (usedId == 1777 || withId == 1777) {
		for (int i = 0; i < UNSTRUNG_BOWS.length; i++) {
			System.out.println(UNSTRUNG_BOWS.length);
			for (int i1 = 0; i1 < 2; i1++) {
				System.out.println(UNSTRUNG_BOWS[i][i1]);
				if (usedId == UNSTRUNG_BOWS[i][i1] || withId == UNSTRUNG_BOWS[i][i1]) {
					if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FLETCHING) < STRUNG_BOWS[i][i1][1]) {
							player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a Fletching level of " + STRUNG_BOWS[i][i1][1] + " to make "+ /*Utils.getAOrAn(ItemDefinition.forId(UNSTRUNG_BOWS[i][i1]).getName()) + */".");
							return true;
					}
					player.getInventory().remove(new Item(1777, 1));
					player.getInventory().remove(new Item(UNSTRUNG_BOWS[i][i1],1 ));
					player.getInventory().add(new Item(STRUNG_BOWS[i][i1][0], 1)); //obviously should get the id out of an array
					player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.FLETCHING, RECIEVED_STRUNG_EXPERIENCE[i]);
					player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You add a string to the bow.");
				}
			}
		}
		return true;
	} else if (usedId == 314|| withId == 314) {
		if (usedId == 52 || withId == 52) {
			int make = 15;
			if (player.getInventory().getNumberOf(new Item(52)) < 15)
				make = player.getInventory().getNumberOf(new Item(52));
			if (player.getInventory().getNumberOf(new Item(314)) < make)
				make = player.getInventory().getNumberOf(new Item(314));
				player.getInventory().remove(new Item(314, make));
				player.getInventory().remove(new Item(52, make));
				player.getInventory().add(new Item(53, make));
				//Inventory.refresh(player);
				player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.FLETCHING, make);
			if (make == 1) {
				player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You attach a feather to the arrow shaft.");
			} else {
				player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You attach feathers to "+make+" arrow shafts.");
			}
			return true;
		}
		for (int i = 0; i < DART_TIPS.length; i++) {
			System.out.println("i = "+i);
			if (usedId == DART_TIPS[i][0] || withId == DART_TIPS[i][0]) {
				arrayIndex = i;
			}
		}
			System.out.println("darts arrayIndex = "+arrayIndex);
			System.out.println("DARTS!");
			if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FLETCHING) < DART_TIPS[arrayIndex][1]) {
				player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a Fletching level of " + DART_TIPS[arrayIndex][1] + " to make "+ IoBufferUtils.getAOrAn(ItemDefinition.forId(FINISHED_DARTS[arrayIndex]).getName())+" " + ItemDefinition.forId(FINISHED_DARTS[arrayIndex]).getName().toLowerCase().toLowerCase() + ".");
				   return true;
			}
			int make = 10;
			if (player.getInventory().getNumberOf(new Item(DART_TIPS[arrayIndex][0])) < 10)
				make = player.getInventory().getNumberOf(new Item(DART_TIPS[arrayIndex][0]));
			if (player.getInventory().getNumberOf(new Item(314)) < make)
				make = player.getInventory().getNumberOf(new Item(314));
				player.getInventory().remove(new Item(314, make));
				player.getInventory().remove(new Item(DART_TIPS[arrayIndex][0], make));
				player.getInventory().add(new Item(FINISHED_DARTS[arrayIndex], make));
				player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.FLETCHING, make*DARTS_EXP[arrayIndex]);
				//Inventory.refresh(player);
			if (make == 1) {
				player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You finish making the dart.");
			} else {
				player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You finish making "+make+" darts.");
			}
			return true;

	}
		if (usedId == 53 || withId == 53) {
			for (int i = 0; i < ARROWHEADS.length; i++) {
				if (usedId == ARROWHEADS[i][0] || withId == ARROWHEADS[i][0]) {
					arrayIndex = i;
				}
			}
			System.out.println("arrowhead arrayIndex = "+arrayIndex);
			if (arrayIndex == -1) {
				return false;
			} else {
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FLETCHING) < ARROWHEADS[arrayIndex][1]) {
					   player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a Fletching level of " + ARROWHEADS[arrayIndex][1] + " to make "+IoBufferUtils.getAOrAn(ItemDefinition.forId(FINISHED_ARROWS[arrayIndex]).getName()) + " "+ ItemDefinition.forId(FINISHED_ARROWS[arrayIndex]).getName().toLowerCase() +".");
					   return true;
				}
				System.out.println("ARROWHEADS");
				int make = 15;
				if (player.getInventory().getNumberOf(new Item(53)) < 15)
					make = player.getInventory().getNumberOf(new Item(53));
				if (player.getInventory().getNumberOf(new Item(ARROWHEADS[arrayIndex][0])) < make)
					make = player.getInventory().getNumberOf(new Item(ARROWHEADS[arrayIndex][0]));
				System.out.println("arrowhead = " + ItemDefinition.forId(ARROWHEADS[arrayIndex][0]).getName());
					player.getInventory().remove(new Item(ARROWHEADS[arrayIndex][0], make));
					//Inventory.deleteItem(player, ARROWHEADS[arrayIndex][0], make);
					player.getInventory().remove(new Item(53, make));
					player.getInventory().add(new Item(FINISHED_ARROWS[arrayIndex], make));
					player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.FLETCHING, ARROWHEAD_EXP[arrayIndex]);
					//Inventory.refresh(player);
				if (make == 1) {
					player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You attach an arrow head to the arrow shaft.");
				} else {
					player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You attach arrow heads to " + make + " arrow shafts.");
				}
				return true;
			}
		
	}
		return false;		
	}

public static void make(final Player player, final int amount, final int slot) {
	player.getActionSender().sendCloseInterface();
	final int arrayIndex = (Integer)player.getTemporary("FLETCHING_INDEX");
	if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FLETCHING) < REQUIRED_LEVELS[arrayIndex][slot]) {
		player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a Fletching level of " + REQUIRED_LEVELS[arrayIndex][slot] + " to make a "+ ItemDefinition.forId(STRUNG_BOWS[arrayIndex][slot][0]).getName().toLowerCase() + ".");
		return;
	} else if (player.getTemporary("IS_FLETCHING") != null) {
		((ActionEvent)player.getTemporary("ACTION_EVENT")).stop();
		return;
	}
	player.addTemporary("IS_FLETCHING", true);
	player.playAnimation(Animation.create(1248));
	//save memory here by doing it via the player class (player.getInventory()) and then doing Inventory.refresh() at the very end?
	player.getInventory().remove(new Item(LOGS[arrayIndex], 1));
	player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.FLETCHING, RECIEVED_UNSTRUNG_EXPERIENCE[arrayIndex][slot]);
	//save memory here by doing it via the player class (player.getInventory()) and then doing Inventory.refresh() at the very end?
	if (arrayIndex == 0) {
		player.getInventory().add(new Item(UNSTRUNG_BOWS[arrayIndex][slot], 15));
	} else {
		player.getInventory().add(new Item(UNSTRUNG_BOWS[arrayIndex][slot], 1));	
	}
	player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You carefully cut the wood into a " + ItemDefinition.forId(UNSTRUNG_BOWS[arrayIndex][slot]).getName().toLowerCase() + ".");
	ActionEvent event = new ActionEvent() {
		
		int amt = amount-1;
		private Event event;

		@Override
		public void run() {
			event = new Event(1200) {
				public void execute() {
					if(!player.getInventory().contains((LOGS[arrayIndex])) || amt < 1) {
						stop();
						player.playAnimation(Animation.create(-1));
						player.removeTemporary("IS_FLETCHING");
						return;
					}
					player.playAnimation(Animation.create(1248));
					//save memory here by doing it via the player class (player.getInventory()) and then doing Inventory.refresh() at the very end?
					player.getInventory().remove(new Item(LOGS[arrayIndex], 1));
					player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.FLETCHING, RECIEVED_UNSTRUNG_EXPERIENCE[arrayIndex][slot]);
					//save memory here by doing it via the player class (player.getInventory()) and then doing Inventory.refresh() at the very end?
					if (arrayIndex == 0) {
						player.getInventory().add(new Item(UNSTRUNG_BOWS[arrayIndex][slot], 15));
					} else {
						player.getInventory().add(new Item(UNSTRUNG_BOWS[arrayIndex][slot], 1));	
					}
					player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You carefully cut the wood into a " + ItemDefinition.forId(UNSTRUNG_BOWS[arrayIndex][slot]).getName().toLowerCase().replaceAll(" (u)", ".") + ".");
					System.out.println("amt = "+amt);
					amt--;
				}
			};
			World.getWorld().submit(event);
		}

		@Override
		public void stop() {
			player.playAnimation(Animation.create(-1));
			player.removeTemporary("IS_FLETCHING");
			return;				
		}
	};
	player.addTemporary("ACTION_EVENT", event);
	event.run();
}

@Override
public Object getObject() {
	return this;
}

}
[/code]

item.title: First Class
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Rush Ags Rush
item.description:
@Ags_Rush wrote:

This is my first class that i have written myself. I had some help from Randqm. This is a delta btw. I’m going to try to make all of the skills into classes, instead of client based.

Tell me what you think?

[code]/*
Fletching
By Zach
*/

class Fletching {

static void itemonItem(client c, int Item, int Item2) {
	/* Logs */

if(Item == 1511 && Item2 == 5605 || Item == 5605 && Item2 == 1511) {
c.fletchLog(Item, Item2, 841, 1, 230, 1623, “Shortbow”); // Normal Shortbow
}
if(Item == 1521 && Item2 == 5605 || Item == 5605 && Item2 == 1521) {
c.fletchLog(Item, Item2, 845, 15, 460, 1821, “Oak shorbow”); // Oak Shortbow
}
if(Item == 1519 && Item2 == 5605 || Item == 5605 && Item2 == 1519) {
c.fletchLog(Item, Item2, 849, 30, 700, 2003, “Willow shortbow”); // Willow Shortbow
}
if(Item == 1517 && Item2 == 5605 || Item == 5605 && Item2 == 1517) {
c.fletchLog(Item, Item2, 853, 45, 939, 2310, “Maple shortbow”); // Maple Shortbow
}
if(Item == 1515 && Item2 == 5605 || Item == 5605 && Item2 == 1515) {
c.fletchLog(Item, Item2, 857, 60, 1323, 2632, “Yew Shortbow”); // Yew Shortbow
}
if(Item == 1513 && Item2 == 5605 || Item == 5605 && Item2 == 1513) {
c.fletchLog(Item, Item2, 861, 75, 1634, 3001, “Magic Shortbow”); //Magic Shortbow
}
}
}

/*
Fletching 40% Done
Still need to add, shafting, longbows, and crossbows, and the interfaces
*
*
*/
[/code]

Read full topic
